original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 851: Buckets of Money
original_content:
This week Jonathan talks to James Cole about Firefly III, the personal finance manager! This one itches James own itch, but brings great visualization and management tools for your personal finances!


https://www.firefly-iii.org/
https://docs.firefly-iii.org/?mtm_campaign=firefly-iii-orgmtm_kwd=top-link
https://github.com/firefly-iii/firefly-iii/


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.
